main event: A witness in Camden, Ohio observed a bright reddish-yellow object that moved back and forth and disappeared from view over a 20-minute period on May 10, 1966.
interesting points: The object appeared to be a very high-powered searchlight and made no sound.
The witness was unable to estimate the distance but believed the object was about 6 miles away.
The object moved at a very fast speed and hovered at times.
The witness had previously reported a similar green circular object on May 10, 1966.
